title: Meeting: Intro Meet
description: Goals, challenges, technical requirements, success criteria

title: POC Kick Off
description:
1. Confirm Value Framework
2. Confirm Scope
3. Review POC Plan
4. Setup check-in schedule
5. Enable Trial for uncapped ingestion
6. Review Integrations

title: Post Kick-off TODOs
description:
1. Deploy SDKs
2. Enable Errors, Tracing, and Replays
3. Start on Integrations (Slack, GitHub)
4. Loop in customer Legal, Security, or Operations as needed

title: POC Check-in #1
description:
1. Review Data from SDK instrumentation
2. Review Critical Experiences
3. Initial review of data

title: Post Check-in #1 TODOs
description:
1. Enable Integrations as needed
2. Enrich Events
3. Set up repos for Seer

title: POC Check-in #2
description:
1. Enrich Events: Tags, Breadcrumbs, environment, and other context
2. Review Seer usage
3. Build Critical Experience Dashboard
4. Other Integrations
5. Sentry workflow-issue attribution with CODEOWNERS or Ownership Rules

title: POC Check-in #3
description:
1. Remaining questions and determine remaining tasks
2. Q&A
